modName: Dragonscale Black and Silver with Hood
summary: Retextured Dragonscale, but the helmet has been transformed into a hood.
descriptionHtml:
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Description:[/b]

Re-textured Dragonscale, but the helmet has been transformed into a hood.
I also included a version with the original helmet, if you prefer it.
Both versions work independently, so you only need to download one file.
Additionally, i have remade the hand textures on the gauntlets to look much better.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Version history:[/b]

1.0 - Release
1.0 - Added original helmet version under optional files. It\'s standalone so you don\'t have to download both files

1.1 - Added shield texture to both file versions
1.1 - Added new gauntlet textures for both versions
1.1 - Cleaned description a bit

1.2 - Edited boot textures for both versions - They are now darker on the back
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

[b]Credits/tools used:[/b]

Bethesda - Skyrim, and the original textures of course
Paint.NET - texture conversion so i could edit it, as well as some of the editing
Gimp 2.0 - editor used for some of the textures
fume0101 - The original [url=file.php?id=4884]DragonHood[/url] mesh and texture
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Installing:[/b]

[i]Using NMM[/i]
Add the archive to your modlist and activate it.

[i]Using WinRAR or 7-Zip (or another archive tool)[/i]
Extract to the data folder. This is usually located in C:/Program Files (x86)/Steam/Steamapps/common/Skyrim/data on Windows 7 and vista. On Widows XP it should follow the same path, but will not include the (x86) tag.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Uninstalling:[/b]

[i]Using NMM[/i]
Deactivate in your mod list if you still want to keep the
mod, or press delete if you want to remove it permanently

[i]Using WinRAR or 7-Zip (or another archive tool)[/i]
Delete the files originally extracted to your data folder.
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


[b]Additional Information:[/b]

The sword seen in some the screenshots can be found in the [url=file.php?id=5074]Elven Great Blade Standalone 2_0[/url] mod.

The daggers shown in the screenshot \"Front 6\" and \"Detail 3\" can be found in the [url=file.php?id=1002]JaySuS Swords[/url] mod.
author: Vohcaz
